Kathak.description: Kathak is a classical dance form from North India known for its intricate footwork, spins, and storytelling.
Kathak.significance: Kathak is a story-telling dance that highlights the cultural heritage of India.

Bharatanatyam.description: Bharatanatyam is one of the oldest classical dance forms of India.
Bharatanatyam.significance: Bharatanatyam is known for its graceful movements and intricate footwork.
